name: A Free Ocean Animals Puzzle for Kindergarten Kids
name_original: A Free Ocean Animals Puzzle for Kindergarten Kids
description:
Lovingly designed, 100% free puzzles for small children with funny ocean animals.
The game contains a variety of funny cartoon motifs and different puzzle types!

Thus the free ocean animal puzzle for small children and babies is the perfect app for the early promotion of preschoolers.
Perfect for children aged 0 to 6 years.

Dear parents:
Please note that we offer the content of the game completely for free. However, this requires the insertion of advertising ads. If you want to disable them, you can turn off the advertising in the game by an InApp purchase. Alternatively, you can download one of our other game versions.

Now install the game and see for yourself why this is the perfect app for small children and babies.

Send your feedback and support requests to: support@mcpeppergames.com

If you like our Ocean Animals game, please rate it in the App Store. This helps us to develop new content and new games for children.

Many Thanks!

Your McPeppergames team
